question: What kind of beverages do you have?
response: At Meskott Restaurant, we offer a variety of beverages to complement your dining experience. Some of our options include Fresh Passion Juice, Homemade Ginger Lemonade, and several red wines such as Pinotage Red Wine, Chateau Haut-Bages Red Wine, Les Terraires Red Wine, and Les Puces red Wine. We also have Bottega Prosecco Sparkling and Moet and Chandon Champagne. Looking forward to serving you one of these delicious beverages soon at Meskott! If you have any other questions, please let us know.
